import sys
from collections import deque

N = int(input())
a = list(map(int, sys.stdin.read().split()))

# BFS
queue = deque([1])
visited = [False] * N
visited[0] = True

while len(queue) > 0:
    num = queue.popleft()
    if num == N:
        print(visited[num])
        sys.exit()
    if not visited[a[num-1]-1]:
        visited[a[num-1]-1] = visited[num] + 1
        queue.append(a[num-1])

print(-1)
